description: Rose gets some experiments with electricity. She must hold her hands up to avoid a sharp shock to the pussy. Later, she must stand on the tips of her toes to keep her arms parallel with the ground - if she falters, she gets similarly shocked. Credit must go to House of Gord for advice about mercury switches. Gord's is the undisputed king of new bondage devices and fucking machinery! His work is inspirational.
title: Rose
